## HybridPolicyDefinition type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Helper type for creating policy definitions that work with both legacy and AST-aware modes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type HybridPolicyDefinition<TOptions extends ASTAwarePolicyOptions = ASTAwarePolicyOptions> = BasePolicyDefinition<TOptions> | ASTAwarePolicyDefinition<TOptions>;
```
**References:** [ASTAwarePolicyOptions](./change-detector-core.astawarepolicyoptions.md)<!-- -->, [BasePolicyDefinition](./change-detector-core.policydefinition.md)<!-- -->, [ASTAwarePolicyDefinition](./change-detector-core.astawarepolicydefinition.md)
